info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 6:31PM MST until July 31 at 7:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MST/745 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE AND SOUTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 631 PM MST /631 PM PDT/, Emergency management reported roads closed throughout Golden Valley with multiple water rescues occurring from the heavy rain. Between 0.75 and 1.25 inches of rain have fallen with locally up to 2 inches in Thirteen Mile Wash along Highway 93. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kingman, Laughlin, Katherine Landing, Yucca, Windy Point Campground, Packsaddle Campground, Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads, Chloride, New Kingman-Butler, Grand Canyon Ranch, Valentine, Dolan Springs, Blake Ranch Road, Dw Ranch Road, Golden Valley, Meadview, Grand Canyon Skywalk, Hualapai Mountain Park and Wild Cow Campground. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
